document_data.mainbody:
The Dwarves of Destiny were an adventuring company based in Saerloon in Sembia in the midâ€“14 century DR.
In Eleint of the , the Dwarves of Destiny went into the Underdark in search of the lost Mielikkian treespeaker Elanalue Sharrith, whod been captured by drow and taken into slavery years earlier, in the . The holy Mielikkian spellbook known as Yornars Trail Companion had gone missing with her. But the Dwarves of Destiny, like five other adventuring companies before them, had not returned as of 1368 DR.
